default_rules:
ğŸ’¼ **Telegram Account Selling Guide**
Welcome! This guide explains how you can earn money by selling Telegram accounts, along with the rules, requirements, payment terms, and withdrawal process. Please read carefully before using the bot.
________________________________________
ğŸ’° **How Do I Earn?**
You can earn by selling real, active Telegram accounts through our bot. All accounts must meet strict quality standards and follow the rules listed below. Every successful sale earns you USD, which can be withdrawn in USDT.
________________________________________
âœ… **Account Requirements**
To ensure high quality, all accounts must meet these conditions:
â€¢ ğŸ“± Must be real and active
â€¢ ğŸ” 2FA (two-factor authentication) must be disabled
â€¢ ğŸ“§ No linked email addresses
â€¢ ğŸ›‚ Must pass our verification process
________________________________________
ğŸš« **Strictly Prohibited (Violations Lead to Ban)**
â€¢ âŒ Selling fake, invalid, spam, or frozen accounts
â€¢ ğŸ¤– Using bots, automation, or scripts
â€¢ ğŸ” Reusing accounts after sale
â€¢ ğŸ“¬ Sharing personal or sensitive information
â€¢ ğŸ”§ Attempting to bypass security or cheat the system
________________________________________
ğŸ’¸ **Payment Terms**
â€¢ ğŸ’° Minimum withdrawal: $3
â€¢ â³ Processing time: 1 day
________________________________________
ğŸ¦ **How to Withdraw Your Earnings**
Your earnings are stored in USD, and payments are made in USDT.
To withdraw:
1. Click the [ Cash Out ] button in the bot menu.
2. Ensure your balance is at least $3
3. Only one withdrawal per 24 hours is allowed
4. No pending withdrawal requests should exist
5. A processing fee will apply
________________________________________
By using this bot, you automatically agree to all rules, requirements, and payment terms listed above. Violating any part of this policy may result in penalties or account suspension.
